text: and then like last year we're bringing
back our overflow program so every
single venue where there's content so
all five venues that have content the
Venetian the Mirage the Aria the
Bellagio and the MGM every single one of
those places will have an overflow room
that's dedicated specifically to session
overflow so you can see both content
that's being overflowed from in that
venue and content that's being
overflowed across venues so if you are
at the Aria there's four sessions you
want to see there but you have an
hour-long break and there's something
that was happening at the Venetian that
you couldn't get to you chances are it's
being overflowed into the Aria and you
can go see it there so we're definitely
kind of focused on I'm just making sure
we have the right balance of content for
people to see and that we don't just
have a lot of content but the right
content and listening to customer
feedback on that so we've taken that to
heart this year for sure yeah and then
some improvements to the mobile app just
to make sure that it runs the the way
that it's expected and also that through
the mobile app you can make have some
recommendations on when you need to
leave how best to get from point A to
point B yet it'll be interactive and
kind of help you manage transportation
so they wanted the mobile app and our
transportation system to talk to each
other this year so it'll be pretty cool
I'm excited about it
